text: How do you attach Teams with HubSpot Agenda ?
Thanks, i'll try. I've develop my own integration to manage it ( looping thought a csv and update the notes with good owner )

Trying to use the forms API to submit some data (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form#tab-10>).  Basically using the example posted, but getting a 400 error. Any ideas why that might be?
